text:
亚马逊日：Prime 会员可以选择每周指定的一天递送包裹。 这是一种免费、便捷的方式来选择包裹到达您家门口的时间和方式。
成为会员可以通过 Prime最大限度地享受亚马逊丰富的选择、超凡的价值和快速的送货服务。
眼看大促在即，亚马逊为了引流也是大招连连，各位卖家把握机会！
103 个 233 个
trans:
Amazon Prime Day: Prime members can choose one designated day per week for package delivery. This is a free and convenient way to select the time and manner in which your packages arrive at your doorstep.
As a member, you can fully enjoy Amazon's rich selection, extraordinary value, and fast delivery service through Prime.
With the big promotion just around the corner, Amazon is pulling out all the stops to drive traffic—sellers, seize the opportunity!
103 items, 233 items.
